mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_address(login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude, created_at, modified_at, created_by, modified_by) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{streetAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, NOW(), #{modifiedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT id, login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude FROM user_address WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
